1.7.1.en: Added support for Systemair Save Connect over local http.

1.7.0.en: Added support for Systemair Save Connect over local http.

1.5.0.en: Added option to go back to previous fan mode.

1.4.4.en: Support for Systemair IAM in Modbus TCP converter mode.

1.4.3.en: Support for Systemair IAM in Modbus TCP converter mode.

1.4.2.en: Support for Systemair IAM in Modbus TCP converter mode.

1.4.1.en: Support for Systemair IAM in Modbus TCP converter mode.

1.4.0.en: Support for Systemair IAM in Modbus TCP converter mode.

1.3.4.en: Added option for Temperature report interval.

1.3.1.en: Added capability, condition and action card for 'ECO mode'. Removed 'Off' as fan mode.

1.3.0.en: Added capability, condition and action card for 'ECO mode'. Removed 'Off' as fan mode.

1.2.0.en: Fixes after changes to the logon method.

1.1.1.en: Added 'Specific alarm activated' trigger. Added 'Function activated', 'Specific function activated', 'Function deactivated' and 'Specific function deactivated' triggers. Added 'Function is/isn't active' condition. Added capabilities for extract and supply fan speeds. Removed 'Cooker hood changed' trigger. Fixes for flow titles.

1.1.0.en: Added 'Specific alarm activated' trigger. Added 'Function activated', 'Specific function activated', 'Function deactivated' and 'Specific function deactivated' triggers. Added 'Function is/isn't active' condition. Added capabilities for extract and supply fan speeds. Removed 'Cooker hood changed' trigger.

1.0.2.en: Added support for cooker hoods. Added capability for overheat temperature. Added capability for days before filter replacement. Added support for alarms. Updated to firmware 5.0.0.

1.0.1.en: Added support for cooker hoods. Added capability for overheat temperature. Added capability for days before filter replacement. Updated to firmware 5.0.0.

1.0.0.en: Added support for cooker hoods. Added capability for overheat temperature. Added capability for days before filter replacement. Updated to firmware 5.0.0.

0.9.8.en: Systemair IAM Cloud: added Extract air temperature. Systemair IAM Cloud: added Outdoor, Supply and Extract temperature changed triggers.
0.9.8.no: Systemair IAM Cloud: la inn Extract air temperature. Systemair IAM Cloud: la inn triggere for Outdoor, Supply og Extract temperatur.

0.9.7.en: Systemair IAM Cloud: added conditions for fan mode and mode. Systemair IAM Cloud: added triggers for fan mode changed and mode changed. Systemair IAM Cloud: added boost mode. Systemair IAM Cloud: added modes for Away, Crowded, Fireplace, Holiday and Refresh. Systemair IAM Cloud: view Mode and Fan mode as sensors
0.9.7.no: Systemair IAM Cloud: la inn conditions for fan mode og mode. Systemair IAM Cloud: la inn triggere for fan mode changed og mode changed. Systemair IAM Cloud: la til boost mode. Systemair IAM Cloud: la inn modes for Away, Crowded, Fireplace, Holiday og Refresh. Systemair IAM Cloud: vise Mode og Fan mode som sensors

0.9.6.en: Systemair IAM Cloud: added conditions for fan mode and mode. Systemair IAM Cloud: added triggers for fan mode changed and mode changed. Systemair IAM Cloud: added boost mode. Systemair IAM Cloud: added modes for Away, Crowded, Fireplace, Holiday and Refresh
0.9.6.no: Systemair IAM Cloud: la inn conditions for fan mode og mode. Systemair IAM Cloud: la inn triggere for fan mode changed og mode changed. Systemair IAM Cloud: la til boost mode. Systemair IAM Cloud: la inn modes for Away, Crowded, Fireplace, Holiday og Refresh

0.9.5.en: Systemair IAM Cloud: fixed an issue about setting modes between Auto and Manual. Systemair IAM Cloud: added check for IAM / password when adding the device. Systemair IAM Cloud: added polling interval to Advanced settings. Default is 30 seconds. Fixed README. Renamed 'Systemair HVAC adapter' to 'Systemair Z-wave'. Systemair IAM Cloud: Fixed icon.
0.9.5.no: Systemair IAM Cloud: rettet en feil ved bytting mellom Auto og Manuell. Systemair IAM Cloud: la inn sjekk for IAM id og passord. Systemair IAM Cloud: la inn polle interval i Avanserte instillinger.  Default er 30 sekunder. Fikset README. Endret navn på 'Systemair HVAC adapter' til 'Systemair Z-wave'. Systemair IAM Cloud: rettet icon.

0.9.4.en: Systemair IAM Cloud: fixed an issue about setting modes between Auto and Manual. Systemair IAM Cloud: added check for IAM / password when adding the device. Systemair IAM Cloud: added polling interval to Advanced settings. Default is 30 seconds. Fixed README. Renamed 'Systemair HVAC adapter' to 'Systemair Z-wave'
0.9.4.no: Systemair IAM Cloud: rettet en feil ved bytting mellom Auto og Manuell. Systemair IAM Cloud: la inn sjekk for IAM id og passord. Systemair IAM Cloud: la inn polle interval i Avanserte instillinger.  Default er 30 sekunder. Fikset README. Endret navn på 'Systemair HVAC adapter' til 'Systemair Z-wave'.

0.9.3.en: Initial support for the Internet Access Module (Cloud)
0.9.3.no: Første versjon med støtte for Internet Access Module (Cloud)

0.0.2.en: Added actions and triggers. Fixed README
0.0.2.no: La inn actions and triggers. Rettet README
